attributes.action: Introduce Pedal Bike Licensing and Registration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cyclists want more of the roads, that we, motorists, pay for, so they can pay for them. I believe cyclists have become a bigger hazard to everyone else than we are to them. I believe all cyclists should have to undergo training, pass a test, pay a small tax (£10 possibly, in comparison to what cars pay, it's nothing), then if they want cycle paths, that can pay for them, but they also know that if they don't obey the laws of the road they will also be prosecuted. Too many run red lights, cycle dangerously on both pavements and roads. If you want your space, and your safety, you should pay for it as every other road user has to.
